text: Shadows in the Night () is a 1950 West German drama film directed by Eugen York and starring Hilde Krahl, Willy Fritsch and Carl Raddatz.Bock & Bergfelder p. 134 A happily married woman is blackmailed by a former lover. It was made at the Wandsbek Studios by the Hamburg-based Real Film. ==Cast== * Hilde Krahl as Elga * Willy Fritsch as Ernst Magnus * Carl Raddatz as Richard Struwe * Josef Sieber as Mumme * Hermann Schomberg as Edgar Elsberg * Arnim Dahl as Freitag * Carl-Heinz Schroth as Minjes * Lilo Müller as Heidi * Ursula Herking as Julia * Thessy Kuhls as Margit * Inge Meysel as Lisa * Albert Florath as Kommissar * Franz Schafheitlin * Helmut Gmelin * Änne Bruck * Karl- Heinz Peters as Wirt * Carl Voscherau == References == == Bibliography == * Bock, Hans-Michael & Bergfelder, Tim. The Concise CineGraph. Encyclopedia of German Cinema. Berghahn Books, 2009. == External links == * Category:1950 films Category:West German films Category:German drama films Category:1950 drama films Category:German-language films Category:Films directed by Eugen York Category:Films shot at Wandsbek Studios Category:Real Film films
title: Shadows in the Night (1950 film)
